descriptionHTML:
Timagine Watch Face for Android Wear


Designed by Steven Cui


If you are getting bored with the antiquated analog and digital watch display, please try our groundbreaking watch display.



Watch Face Features:

- innovative watch face design with ultimate readability

- interactive watch face

- watch battery indicator

- phone battery indicator

- date and day of week

- daily step count

- adjust for the chin of the Moto 360

- for round watch faces



Installation:

After installing timagine watch face, it will take a few minutes to be synced to your watch before you can activate the watch face.

Long press on your android wear watch and choose Timagine Watch Face.



We Need Your Ideas:

If you have any great idea about watch face design, you are more than welcome to email us at android@timagine.cn

we are looking forward to accomplishing your ideas to the Android wear store.


We Need Your Help:

If it doesn't run perfectly on your android wear watch, please email us the problem and your specific android wear watch model, and we will reply to you and fix it as soon as possible.


Compatible with these Android wear:

Moto 360 ( moto360 ) 42mm&46mm

HUAWEI watch

LG G watch R

LG G watch w100

LG watch urbane

Ticwatch


Will be compatible with these watches soon:

Sony Smartwatch

Samsung Gear

Asus ZenWatch ( zen watch 1 & 2 )

Fossil Q

TAG Heuer


More watch faces from Timagine:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=Timagine


Join our Google+ and Facebook community and get free watch faces :

G+:https://plus.google.com/u/0/collection/ASRSSB

Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/groups/timagine/
comments: No ambient mode. Color setting is not working . limited time available app. Waste to use. Not even one positive to use this app.

Really Nice But! On my LG R Watch Urban the graphics does not fill the clocks display. It's a five star rating if that would be corrected plus the ability to do other colors ;-) Also us that are not constrained by the Moto 360's 'flat tire' would be nice if we could utilize that part for something. Maybe the pedometer? Also a 24 hour setting would be really nice for us not on the am/pm side of things :-)
very cool... hi. I meant maybe a tap active area to pop up day of week/date as I think showing on main display might be tricky..cheers

By far the best watch face I absolutely love this thing and even the features are free sure you do not get detailed information about steps and battery but you do get an Idea and the phone battery didn't work but I still absolutely love it.
Small face is hard to read on my Smartwatch 3, plus the card preview covers up the face instead of staying below it.
recentChanges: Change WatchFace  style through Android wear app

You can change five types of watch face through phone on the condition of your phone and watch connect correctly,if your watch is tic-wear,maybe the change won't work,we will consider it in the future.
We think more type of watch face in the future .Thanks for your use and welcome to feedback us feedback@timagine.cn
